text: Kasdi Merbah (, 16 April 1938 â€“ 21 August 1993) was an Algerian politician. He was Head of Government between 5 November 1988 and 9 September 1989. He was a member of the National Liberation Front. He was assassinated on August 21, 1993.Frank Tachau (1994) Political parties of the Middle East and North Africa, Greenwood Press, p. 45. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Assassinated people Category:Prime ministers of Algeria
title: Kasdi Merbah
